alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 12:13PM CDT until May 22 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau affecting Webster, Bienville, Bossier and Red River Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 142.5 feet, Expect some minor flooding of low area camps, however, all access roadways will remain open. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 142.3 feet. - Forecast...The lake pool is expected to rise to a crest of 142.5 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood pool stage early Monday morning. - Flood pool stage is 142.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 1215 PM CDT.
